statements: SELECT * FROM oil_spills;
SELECT id, location, spill_volume FROM oil_spills ORDER BY spill_date DESC;
SELECT location, spill_date FROM oil_spills WHERE spill_volume > 1000;
SELECT id, impact_description FROM oil_spills WHERE location LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT * FROM oil_spills WHERE spill_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM oil_spills WHERE spill_volume > 1000 ORDER BY spill_date DESC;
SELECT location, spill_date FROM oil_spills WHERE impact_description LIKE '%marine%' ORDER BY location ASC, spill_date DESC;
SELECT id, spill_date, impact_description FROM oil_spills WHERE location = 'Gulf of Mexico' OR location = 'North Sea' ORDER BY spill_date ASC;
SELECT id, location, spill_volume FROM oil_spills WHERE spill_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY spill_volume DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM oil_spills WHERE impact_description IS NOT NULL AND location <> 'Pacific Ocean' ORDER BY id DESC, location ASC, spill_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM OilSpills WHERE volume > 100
SELECT location, spill_date FROM OilSpills ORDER BY spill_date DESC
SELECT id, location FROM OilSpills WHERE location LIKE '%ocean%'
SELECT id, ecosystem_name, species_impacted FROM MarineEcosystems WHERE impact_rating > 3
SELECT * FROM MarineEcosystems ORDER BY impact_rating ASC
SELECT * FROM OilSpills WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY spill_date DESC;
SELECT location, volume FROM OilSpills WHERE location LIKE 'North%' OR location LIKE 'South%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, ecosystem_name, species_impacted FROM MarineEcosystems WHERE impact_rating >= 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, impact_rating FROM MarineEcosystems WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Coral Reef' AND species_impacted = 'Fish';
SELECT * FROM OilSpills WHERE spill_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY spill_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM OilSpills;
SELECT location, volume FROM OilSpills ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, date_occurred FROM OilSpills WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT species_name, classification FROM MarineSpecies WHERE habitat = 'Deep sea';
SELECT * FROM ImpactReports WHERE impact_description LIKE '%negative%';
SELECT * FROM OilSpills ORDER BY date_occurred DESC, volume DESC;
SELECT location, volume FROM OilSpills WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ImpactReports JOIN MarineSpecies ON ImpactReports.species_id = MarineSpecies.species_id;
SELECT location, SUM(volume) AS total_volume FROM OilSpills GROUP BY location;
SELECT classification, COUNT(species_id) AS total_species FROM MarineSpecies GROUP BY classification ORDER BY total_species DESC;
SELECT * FROM spills LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, impact FROM spills WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE type = 'Forest' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, specialization FROM researchers WHERE organization = 'Research Institute' LIMIT 5;
SELECT monitoring_id, organization, monitor_date FROM monitoring WHERE monitor_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY monitor_date DESC;
SELECT spill_id, location, volume, impact FROM spills ORDER BY spill_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, volume, impact FROM spills WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE type = 'Forest' AND location = 'Amazon';
SELECT organization, monitor_date, findings FROM monitoring WHERE organization = 'NASA' ORDER BY monitor_date DESC;
SELECT name, specialization, organization FROM researchers WHERE specialization = 'Marine Biology' AND organization = 'Ocean Institute' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM oil_spills;
SELECT location, spill_date FROM oil_spills WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT id, species, population FROM marine_life WHERE affected_by_spill = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM research_teams WHERE name LIKE 'Research%';
SELECT location, ph_level, oxygen_level FROM water_quality ORDER BY ph_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM oil_spills WHERE volume > 100 ORDER BY spill_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, spill_date FROM oil_spills WHERE location LIKE '%ocean%' AND volume < 500 ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT rs.name, mt.id, os.volume FROM research_teams rs LEFT JOIN monitoring_data md ON rs.id = md.research_team_id LEFT JOIN oil_spills os ON md.oil_spill_id = os.id WHERE rs.name = 'TeamA' ORDER BY os.volume DESC;

SELECT ml.species, ml.population, ws.ph_level FROM marine_life ml LEFT JOIN monitoring_data md ON ml.id = md.marine_life_id LEFT JOIN water_quality ws ON md.water_quality_id = ws.id WHERE ml.affected_by_spill = TRUE ORDER BY ml.population DESC;

SELECT os.volume, ws.ph_level, md.research_team_id FROM oil_spills os JOIN monitoring_data md ON os.id = md.oil_spill_id JOIN water_quality ws ON md.water_quality_id = ws.id WHERE ws.ph_level < 7.0 AND md.research_team_id IN (SELECT id FROM research_teams WHERE lead_researcher = 'John Doe') ORDER BY os.volume DESC;
